Subjects: popular verses; friars; sermons, verse in
_description: Fragmentary refrain of a popular song

Lam352.Transcription:
Haue mercy of me broȝirȝer y gaÞin lofe chaungyt
                    my hweit dose me michil wa
Lam352.Note: Quoted in a Latin sermon, lines 3-4..
